meanings.definition: The act of enlisting or joining a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: His enlistment in the club brought him new friends.
meanings.sent2: She completed her enlistment in the volunteer organization.
meanings.sent3: The enlistment of the cat in the mouse-catching squad was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Her enlistment in the book club opened up a world of literature.
meanings.sent5: The enlistment of the robot in the cleaning crew made chores easier.

meanings.definition: The period of time during which one is enlisted in the military.
meanings.sent1: During his enlistment, he learned valuable skills.
meanings.sent2: Her enlistment lasted for two years.
meanings.sent3: The enlistment of the dog in the army lasted longer than expected.
meanings.sent4: His enlistment felt like a journey into the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The enlistment in the navy was a life-changing experience.
